price: Thereafter his Lord chose him, accepted his repentance, and guided him.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
